text: there are cta fields in the custom modules

Yeah, what I want to do is allow the content editor to create a cta, put in the button text in the rich text editor (and nothing else), set the url link, and then be able to pick it with the CTA picker in editor.

then on the markup side, control how the button gets displayed and just pull the {{ module.cta.url }} and the {{ module.cta.content}}} into my module
but alas, I don’t think this is how cta’s work
